:delete-properties-column.label: t__Remove column

:contextual-delete-properties-column.label: t__Remove column

:contextual-insert-proptype.label: t__Add type

:contextual-insert-propvalue.label: t__Add value

:contextual-insert-propvaluehd.description: t__Add a title for the value column

:contextual-insert-propdesc.label: t__Add description
